공통 클래스

공통

  • 스타일 적용 공통 클래스 사용
  • 태그 무관
  • 하단 리스트 이외의 정렬 등으로 인한 클래스 사용 필요 시 bootstrap 내장 클래스 응용

Class

color

is-white-2

is-black-1

is-black-2

is-blue-1

is-navy-1

is-navy-2

is-orange-1

is-gray-1

is-gray-2

is-gray-4

is-gray-8

is-gray-9

is-gray-10

<p class="is-white-1">is-white-1</p> <p class="is-white-2">is-white-2</p> <p class="is-black-1">is-black-1</p> <p class="is-black-2">is-black-2</p> <p class="is-blue-1">is-blue-1</p> <p class="is-navy-1">is-navy-1</p> <p class="is-navy-2">is-navy-2</p> <p class="is-orange-1">is-orange-1</p> <p class="is-gray-1">is-gray-1</p> <p class="is-gray-2">is-gray-2</p> <p class="is-gray-3">is-gray-3</p> <p class="is-gray-4">is-gray-4</p> <p class="is-gray-5">is-gray-5</p> <p class="is-gray-6">is-gray-6</p> <p class="is-gray-7">is-gray-7</p> <p class="is-gray-8">is-gray-8</p> <p class="is-gray-9">is-gray-9</p> <p class="is-gray-10">is-gray-10</p>

<p class="bg-white-1">bg-white-1</p> <p class="bg-white-2">bg-white-2</p> <p class="bg-black-1"><span class="is-white-1">bg-black-1</span></p> <p class="bg-black-2"><span class="is-white-1">bg-black-2</span></p> <p class="bg-blue-1">bg-blue-1</p> <p class="bg-navy-1">bg-navy-1</p> <p class="bg-navy-2">bg-navy-2</p> <p class="bg-orange-1">bg-orange-1</p> <p class="bg-gray-1">bg-gray-1</p> <p class="bg-gray-2">bg-gray-2</p> <p class="bg-gray-3">bg-gray-3</p> <p class="bg-gray-4">bg-gray-4</p> <p class="bg-gray-5">bg-gray-5</p> <p class="bg-gray-6">bg-gray-6</p> <p class="bg-gray-7">bg-gray-7</p> <p class="bg-gray-8">bg-gray-8</p> <p class="bg-gray-9">bg-gray-9</p> <p class="bg-gray-10">bg-gray-10</p>

Spacing

  • Spacing 태그 사용 지양
  • 여백 스타일에 따른 number 부여 0, 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 15, 16, 18, 20, 24, 25, 30, 35, 40, 42, 45, 50, 60, 80, 100, 120
  • margin-top: .mt-* / margin-bottom: .mb-* / margin-left: .ml-* / margin-right: .mr-*
  • padding-top: .pt-* / padding-bottom: .pb-* / padding-left .pl-* / padding-right: .pr-*
<div class="mt-12"></div>

Text Align

text Align Left

text Align Center

text Align Right

<p class="ta-l">text Align Left</p> <p class="ta-c">text Align Center</p> <p class="ta-r">text Align Right</p>
